student.title: Student
student.description: Represents an individual student enrolled in the institution.

registerNumber.description: The unique registration number for the student.

name.description: The full name of the student.

fatherName.description: The name of the student's father.

motherName.description: The name of the student's mother.

department.description: The department the student is enrolled in.

profilePhotoUrl.description: URL of the student's profile photo, used for face recognition.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the student was enrolled.

attendanceRecord.title: Attendance Record
attendanceRecord.description: Represents a single attendance entry for a student on a specific date.

studentRegister.description: The registration number of the student.

studentName.description: The name of the student for easier display.

date.description: The date of the attendance record (YYYY-MM-DD).

matched.description: Whether a student was successfully matched and attendance marked.

method.description: The method used to mark attendance.

confidence.description: The confidence score of the face match (0-100).

photoUrl.description: URL to the snapshot photo used for attendance.

timestamp.description: The exact timestamp when the attendance was marked.

/students/{studentId}.description: Stores individual student documents, keyed by their registration number.
